text: Novobadrakovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Uchpilinsky Selsoviet, Dyurtyulinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 26 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 31 km from Dyurtyuli. == References == Category:Rural localities in Dyurtyulinsky District
title: Novobadrakovo
